package-manager.name: pkgadd
package-manager.title: XML catalog files for Docbook
package-manager.description: Various support files for Docbook use: * Docbook DTDs: 3.1, 4.0, 4.1, 4.2, 4.3 * Docbook XML DTDs: 4.0, 4.1.2, 4.2, 4.3 * Docbook DSSSL stylesheets * Docbook XSL stylesheets * SGML 8879.1986 ISO entities * XML 8879.1986 ISO entities
